# netbox_tenants (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Gets all the Netbox tenants
data "netbox_tenants" "this" {
}

output "tenants" {
  value = data.netbox_tenants.this.ids
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Read-Only

- `ids` (Set of Number) The IDs of the tenant.
